QualitySpecification.name: GC_Attributes_GC3
QualitySpecification.Description: This test has to run once every week

QualityCondition.name: A_GC_0101_Unconsolidated_Deposits_PT_MandatoryFields_extended
QualityCondition.Description: Searches Attributes, that do not coincide with symbology

QualityCondition.name: A_GC_0101_Unconsolidated_Deposits_PT_notInUnco_extended
QualityCondition.Description: Finds erratic bloc that are not contained in UNCO

QualityCondition.name: A_GC_0102_Unconsolidated_Deposits_PLG_Artificial_terraines_in_UNCO_extended
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all Artificial terraines in Unco that should be in Aart

QualityCondition.name: A_GC_0201_[0x1F]Instability_Structures_PT_too_close_extended
QualityCondition.Description: Finds Points of Gins Hinweis für Hanginstabilität that are closer than 100m (=4mm)

QualityCondition.name: A_GC_0304_Tectonic_Boundaries_L_MandatoryFields_ext
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all rows in Tectonic_Boundaries_L that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_00_LINEAR_OBJECTS_positiveNumberValues
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all number values < 0 in Altitude and Reference Year

QualityCondition.name: GC_00_POINT_OBJECTS_positiveNumberValues
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all number values < 0

QualityCondition.name: GC_0101_Unconsolidated_Deposits_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all rows in Unconsolidated_Deposits_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_0102_Unconsolidated_Deposits_PLG_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all rows in Unconsolidated_Deposits_PLG that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_0103_BEDR_LITHO_GC_LITHO_BED_MandatoryRelation
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all rows in GC_BEDROCK containing no relationship GC_LITHO_BED

QualityCondition.name: GC_0103_Bedrock_PLG_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all rows in Bedrock_PLG that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_0204_Instabilities_PLG_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all rows in Instabilities_within_Bedrock_PLG that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_0206_Glacial_and_Periglacial_Structures_L
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all rows in Glacial_and_Periglacial_Structures_L (Moränenwall,...) that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_0210_Karstic_Structures_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 2: Finds all rows in Karstic_Structures_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_0301_Deformation_Structures_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 2 to 4: Finds all rows in Deformation_Structures_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_0303_Deformation_Structures_PLG_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 2: Finds all rows in Deformation_Structures_PLG that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_0304_Tectonic_Boundaries_L_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all rows in Tectonic_Boundaries_L that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_0401_Folds_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 2: Finds all rows in Folds_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_0402_Lineation_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 2: Finds all rows in Lineation_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_0403_Planar_Structures_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all rows in Planar_Structures_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

Scalar.value: KIND IN (13801001) AND DIP NOT IN (0,90)

QualityCondition.name: GC_0501_Anomalies_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 3: Finds all rows in Anomalies_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_0502_Fossils_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 2: Finds all rows in GC_FOSSILS that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_0505_Sedimentary_Structures_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 2-3: Finds all rows in Sedimentary_Structures_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_0506_Type_Localities_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 2, 0: Finds all rows in Type_Localities_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_0507_Prominent_Lithological_Features_L_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all rows in Prominent_Lithological_Features_L that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_0508_Miscellaneous_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 1: Finds all rows in Miscellaneous_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.Description: Prio 3: Finds all rows in Slope_Bedrock_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_0603_Modelled_Water_Table_PT_MandatoryFields

QualityCondition.name: GC_0701_Archaeology_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 3: Finds all rows in Archaeology_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_0707_Boreholes_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 3: Tests the Attributes ABOR_DEPTH_TOT, ABOR_DEPTH_BEDR, ABOR_DEPTH_FM_A, ABOR_DEPTH_FM_B and their logic relation

QualityCondition.name: GC_0801_Construction_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 3: Finds all rows in Construction_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_0803_Palaeohydrology_L_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 2: Finds all rows in Palaeohydrology_L_MandatoryFields that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel

QualityCondition.name: GC_0805_Surface_Water_PT_MandatoryFields
QualityCondition.Description: Prio 2: Finds all rows in Surface_Water_PT that do not fullfill the mandatory rules of the Datamodel for GeoCover V3

QualityCondition.name: GC_ADMIXTURE_GdbConstraint
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all rows in GC_ADMIXTURE that do not fulfill the attribute rules that are defined in the geodatabase

QualityCondition.name: GC_ADMIXTURE_TrimmedTextFields
QualityCondition.Description: Finds rows with text fields having leading or trailing whitespace characters.

QualityCondition.name: GC_ADMIXTURE_UniqueUUID
QualityCondition.Description: Find all none unique UUID-rows in GC_ADMIXTURE

QualityCondition.name: GC_ADMIXTURE_UUID_RegExp
QualityCondition.Description: UUID may only contain capital letters and numbers

QualityCondition.name: GC_ALL_POLYGON_AND_LINEAR_FEATURES_InteriorIntersects
QualityCondition.Description: Finds overlaps

QualityCondition.name: GC_BED_FORM_ATT_GdbConstraint
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all rows in GC_BED_FORM_ATT that do not fulfill the attribute rules that are defined in the geodatabase

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_Duplicates
QualityCondition.Description: Finds features with equal geometries for which the constraint is G1.Kind <> G2.Kind

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_GdbConstraint
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all rows in GC_BEDROCK that do not fulfill the attribute rules that are defined in the geodatabase

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_MinPolygonArea
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all polygons with areas smaller than 100

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_MinSegmentLength
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all segments in GC_BEDROCK with length smaller than 5

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_NeighbourAreas
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all touching features in GC_BEDROCK for wich a list of attributes are equal

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_NoBoundaryLoops
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all boundary loops (closed 'bays' in polygon boundaries) in a polygon feature class and reports them as point errors identifying the location where the boundary loop starts/ends.

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_NoCurves
QualityCondition.Description: Finds segments in GC_BEDROCK that are not straight lines

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_NoMultiparts
QualityCondition.Description: Finds multiparts

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_NonEmptyGeometry
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all features in 'featureClass' with null or empty geometries.

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_NoSliverPolygon
QualityCondition.Description: Polygons with a maximum area of 2000 and a maximum ratio between the square of the perimeter and the area of 500

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_TrimmedTextFields
QualityCondition.Description: Finds rows with text fields having leading or trailing whitespace characters.

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_UniqueUUID
QualityCondition.Description: Finds all none unique UUID-rows in GC_BEDROCK

QualityCondition.name: GC_BEDROCK_UUID_RegExp
QualityCondition.Description: UUID may only contain capital letters and numbers
